def_en: An inspector is a person, usually employed by a government agency, whose job is to find out whether people are obeying official regulations.

def_cn: (英国警察中职位低于警司高于巡佐的)巡官,督察
def_en: In Britain, an inspector is an officer in the police who is higher in rank than a sergeant and lower in rank than a superintendent.

def_cn: (美国警察中仅次于总警监的)督察长
def_en: In the United States, an inspector is an officer in the police who is next in rank to a superintendent or police chief.
